label: 藤原伊周
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: d. 1010 Great Ministre of the Center (Naidaijin), later demoted to the post of Provisional Governor-General (Gonsotsu) of the Government Headquarters in Kyūshū (Dazaifu) (Part A, pp. 315-316).  [内大臣、権帥、九州、太宰府]
